channel.title: namespace on 世风十三学堂
channel.description: Recent content in namespace on 世风十三学堂

item.title: Xml 域名空间识别问题
item.description: 相关文档见：官方ticket任务#823 Yes, this is correct. In the .getXML function the namespace ness is not set. 是的，有这个问题。在.getXML方法中允许命名空间（namespace）没有设置。 This line should be changed from: 这一行应该从这样： :::java DocumentBuilder builder = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance().newDocumentBuilder(); to: 变成： :::java DocumentBuilderFactory xmlFact = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance(); xmlFact.setNamespace(true); DocumentBuilder builder = xmlFact.newDocumentBuilder(); The same problem exists in the XML lib in the getDocument function: 同样的问题在XML的包里的getDo

item.title: Xml 域名空间识别问题
item.description: 相关文档见：官方ticket任务#823 Yes, this is correct. In the .getXML function the namespace ness is not set. 是的，有这个问题。在.getXML方法中允许命名空间（namespace）没有设置。 This line should be changed from: 这一行应该从这样： :::java DocumentBuilder builder = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance().newDocumentBuilder(); to: 变成： :::java DocumentBuilderFactory xmlFact = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance(); xmlFact.setNamespace(true); DocumentBuilder builder = xmlFact.newDocumentBuilder(); The same problem exists in the XML lib in the getDocument function: 同样的问题在XML的包里的getDo
